title: Simulation-Based Lifeboat Steering Training and Skill Transfer Education

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practice-Centered Training for In-Service Professionals. Utilizes Smartphone-Based Simulation Tools

learning_goals: Learners can complete lifeboat launch and navigation simulations with 80% accuracy.
Learners can transfer and apply 70% or more of the skills acquired in training scenarios to new emergency simulations.
Learners can diagnose their steering performance capabilities based on a three-tier evaluation system (debugging–improvement–optimization) using simulation data.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
